message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable product. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment. My initial offer is $1,100,000.
I appreciate your offer, but $1,100,000 is still a bit too high for my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering my budget and the value you place on it.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider my own valuation of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more than $850,000. I'm counteroffering at $950,000.

I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to go up to $900,000 for the product. This is a significant increase from my previous offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise considering the value you place on it.

I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but I'm still not getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $980,000.
